ad_text: W & W Truck & Tractor Sponsored We are looking for employees to assist in our heavy equipment dismantling business. The position is full time Monday – Friday 8am to 5pm with breaks throughout the day. We offer competitive pay and full benefits after a probationary period (free uniforms, sick pay, vacation pay, holiday pay, employer provided - health insurance, eye and dental, and retirement). We are a local third generation family owned business that has operated for 50 years in Berkeley County. Must have a valid SC driver's license and have dependable transportation to work. WWTRACTOR.COM We are hiring! W & W Truck & Tractor Inc. Apply now
